commandDescription:
Populate your org (scratch/development/sandbox/production) with data imported from another org or CSV file.
Refer https://github.com/forcedotcom/SFDX-Data-Move-Utility for the detailed description.
sourceusernameFlagDescription: username or alias to the source org or 'file' if CSV files are used as data source
passwordFlagDescription: password for decrypting credentials provided in 'orgs' section of export.json file assuming they were previously encrypted with the same password
pathFlagDescription: absolute or relative path to the directory that contains working export.json file. If not provided, the plugin will try to search for the file in the current directory
